body: Hi Antonello, I am studying the file which was posted by you, there is a lot of information which is useful for me, Thank you again. I am trying to understand all components in file, but it seems it is difficult for me, could you please help me to understand some components of HB&LB, I attached a photo, I can understand some components which are indicated by green arrows, I can not understand some components which are marked by red line, could you please help me to understand these components of HB&LB.
